summary: AUTOMOTIVE SAFETY RESEARCH INSTITUTE, SOUTH KOREA (KATRI), PRODUCTION DEFECTS IS A REPRESENTATIVE SURVEY  THE RECALL SURVEY BY REFERRING TO THE CONTENTS BELOW WOULD BE APPRECIATED.      HYUNDAI GENESIS SPONGE PHENOMENA DURING BRAKING AND LANE DEPARTURE OCCURS  1 LANE DEPARTURE OCCURS WHEN BRAKING PHENOMENON AND SPONGE OF PASSENGER CARS PRODUCED BY HYUNDAI MOTOR COMPANY (HMC). SALE  2 ABS (ANTI-LOCK BRAKE SYSTEM, CONTINENTAL, MK25E) CONTROL DEVICE (MODULATOR) CORROSION OCCURS IN SOME PARTS I STEPPED ON THE BRAKES NORMALLY BRAKING DELAY OR INCREASE THE STOPPING DISTANCE OF THE VEHICLE TO BRAKE JUNGLE EXPERIENCE SYMPTOMS EVEN IF DEFECTS ARE DISCOVERED  3 ABS (ANTI-LOCK BRAKE SYSTEM) MODULE OF CORROSION STATUS OF A SEVERE CASE OF VEHICLES PUT ON THE BRAKES WHEN THE DRIVER'S INTENDED DIRECTION AND THE OTHER IN THE DIRECTION THE VEHICLE IS PROCEEDING TO CHECK ABS BRAKE UNIT BRAKE WHEELS LOCKED TO PREVENT A SAFETY DEVICE FOR THE DRIVER'S INTENTION TO PROCEED IN ONE DIRECTION:  4 THE INVESTIGATION OF THE DEVICE FOR A VEHICLE ABS (ANTI-LOCK BRAKE SYSTEM, CONTINENTAL, MK25E) DEEMS.  *TR
